§8§oSoon-Mo Jung§r

§72021§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oIn a paper of Jung [The conjecture of Ulam on the invariance of measure on Hilbert cube, J. Math. Anal. Appl. 481 (2020), no. 2, 123500], the conjecture of Ulam on the invariance of measure was proved in the affirmative
only for non-degenerate case. In this paper we provide complete prooffor Ulam's conjecture, whether the related sets are degenerate or non-degenerate. 48 pages, 1 figure\u00a7r
